## Generate Data
```{r, cache=T, cache.path="./cache/"}
set.seed(100)
n <- 200
p <- 10
q <- 20
dim <- (p - 1) * (q + 1)
mG <- generate_mg(p, q)
tB <- generate_tb(p, q, 0.02)
s <- data_generate(n, p, q, tB, mG, reparam = F)
```

```{r}
node <- 1
tictoc::tic()
result <- node_strategy_sparsegl(node, s$X, s$U, 0.03, 0.75, 0.01)
tictoc::toc()
tictoc::tic()
result_custom <- node_strategy_custom(node, s$X, s$U, 0.03, 0.75, 0.01)
tictoc::toc()
```

## Run
```{r run, cache=T, cache.path="./cache/"}
result <- cggr(s$X, s$U, asparse = 0.75, node_strategy_sparsegl)
result_custom <- cggr(s$X, s$U, asparse = 0.75, node_strategy_custom)
```

### Compare gamma
```{r compare gamma, fig.dim=c(10, 3)}
print(gamma_viz_compare(result$ghat, mG))
print(gamma_viz_compare(result_custom$ghat, mG))
```

### Compare beta {.tabset}
```{r, results="asis", echo = F, fig.dim=c(10, 5)}
for (i in seq_len(6)) {
  cat("\n#### comp", i - 1, "\n")
  cov_lbl <- paste0("component ", i - 1)
  cat("\n")
  blist <- list(result_custom$bhat[,,i], result$bhat[,,i], tB[,,i])
  names(blist) <- c("custom", "sparsegl", "true")
  print(beta_viz_list(blist, cov_lbl, tileborder = T))
  cat("\n")
}
```

## Report stats
```{r}
get_stats <- function(res) {
  stats <- list()
  stats$tpr <- sum(res$bhat != 0 & tB != 0) / sum(tB != 0)
  stats$fpr <- sum(res$bhat != 0 & tB == 0) / sum(tB == 0)
  stats$beta_err <- sqrt(sum((tB - res$bhat)^2))
  stats$gamma_err <- sqrt(sum((mG - res$ghat)^2))
  iU <- cbind(1, s$U)
  omega_err <- 0
  for (i in 1:n) {
    omega <- apply(tB, c(1, 2), \(b) b %*% iU[i, ])
    omhat <- apply(res$bhat, c(1, 2), \(b) b %*% iU[i, ])
    omega_err <- omega_err + sum((omega - omhat)^2) / n
  }
  stats$omega_err <- omega_err
  
  return(stats)
}
df <- as.data.frame(rbind(get_stats(result), get_stats(result_custom)),
                    row.names = c("sparsegl", "custom"))
kable(df, digits = 3, padding = 10)  |>
  kable_styling()
```
